short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension providing fun dog facts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever found yourself at a cocktail hour where everybody is sharing interesting dog facts, but you have nothing to add? Well, this is the extension for you! 

At the click of a button you will be provided with a new dog facts, setting you up for success at that next cocktail hour.
